name: BEAM (Prototype)
description:
A prototype for a fast-paced, one-shot, one-kill multiplayer arena shooter. Fate of the project unknown. Use keys 1-4 to change graphics settings, double-press space bar for boost.

Should work on LAN's, but connections over the Internet are harder to establish. Connection troubleshooting: make sure to add the game to your firewall's exceptions. If the IP address you're trying to connect to doesn't work, add :7777 or :7778 at the end of it
